alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Portage; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:29AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Portage, central Waupaca and northern Outagamie Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 528 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Black Creek to near Amherst. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Black Creek around 540 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Nichols, Fitzgerald Corners, Leeman, Sugar Bush, Polonia, Shiocton, Scandinavia, Wolf River Bottoms Wildlife Area, Nelsonville and Ogdensburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
